sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Incident Transform">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
  /**
  *  This is an example of a regex search on a monitor entry.
  *  If you have urgency defined in the text of your alert, then you can search for it with a regex.
  *  assume the alert text would look something like this:
  *
  *  Oh no, something bad happened
  *  Urgency: 3
  *  Too many bad things happened!
  *
  **/

  var urgency = "";
  var re = /Urgency:\s([0-9])/g;
  var m = re.exec(source.text_only_msg);
  // If there is no match, m will be null;
  if (m) {
    if (m.length == 2) {
      urgency = m[1];
    }
  }
	return urgency; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);
]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-12-19 18:49:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-12-19 20:10:58</sys_updated_on><target_field>urgency</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_34f8332adba12300a6ac178039961908
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Incident Transform">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	if(source.ticket_state == 'Resolved') {
		return source.event_title || source.event_msg.substring(0, 140);
	}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_2743b9452fbb3010f75ef7ecf699b6f1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Incident Transform">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
  /**
  *  This is an example of a regex search on a monitor entry.
  *  If you have impact defined in the text of your alert, then you can search for it with a regex.
  *  assume the alert text would look something like this:
  *
  *  Oh no, something bad happened
  *  Impact: 3
  *  Too many bad things happened!
  *
  **/

  var impact = "";
  var re = /Impact:\s([0-9])/g;
  var m = re.exec(source.text_only_msg);
  // If there is no match, m will be null;
  if (m) {
    if (m.length == 2) {
      impact = m[1];
    }
  }
	return impact; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);
]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-11 20:26:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>2743b9452fbb3010f75ef7ecf699b6f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_2743b9452fbb3010f75ef7ecf699b6f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-11 20:26:02</sys_updated_on><target_field>impact</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_b23530d547db7110064b4e0f016d438b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Case Incident Transform Map">2654789547db7110064b4e0f016d43c7</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>case_id</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Incident Transform">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

    var int_severity = 4;

	if (source.priority == 'normal')
		int_severity = 1;
	else if (source.priority == 'all')
		int_severity = 2;
	else if (source.priority == 'low')
		int_severity = 3;

	return int_severity; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-18 19:01:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>6d5c3963db472200c1e6771ebf9619bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_6d5c3963db472200c1e6771ebf9619bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-12-19 02:52:49</sys_updated_on><target_field>priority</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Incident Transform">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	if(source.ticket_state == 'Resolved') {
		return 1; // code for Solved Permanently
	}
	return "";

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-06 20:42:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>20383be6dba12300a6ac1780399619f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_20383be6dba12300a6ac1780399619f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-06 21:07:34</sys_updated_on><target_field>close_code</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Event Transform">37a065cddb872200c1e6771ebf9619ac</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
    if (source.monitor_priority)
		return ['Critical', 'Major', 'Minor', 'Warning', 'OK'][source.monitor_priority - 1];
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_event_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-16 16:27:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>b0b5cbf2db032200c1e6771ebf961987</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_b0b5cbf2db032200c1e6771ebf961987</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-11 20:23:21</sys_updated_on><target_field>severity</target_field><target_table>em_event</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
